main.sprites.powerups

Class Fries

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.sprites.Sprite
      • main.sprites.MotionStageSprite
        • main.sprites.powerups.Fries
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Powerup

    public class Fries
extends MotionStageSprite
implements Powerup
    Name: Jaskaranbir Dhillon
    Date: Thursday, April 22, 2016
    Class Description:

    Class defining the Fries powerup (after consuming which Mario grows; originally Mushroom in original Mario).
    Associated Class: PowerTile

      • Fries

        public Fries(int stageZone,
             float xPos,
             float yPos,
             float xVel,
             float yVel,
             float powerSize)
        Constructs a single ImmunityStar.
        Parameters:
        stageZone - Stage zone in which the brick resides. See class StageFloorBase.
        xPos - The x-Position of Star.
        yPos - The y-Position of Star.
        xVel - The xVel of Star.
        yVel - The yVel of Star.
        powerSize - The size of powerup.
